title: Ep. 93 - Coach Jason Brown from Last Chance U
description: Today the boys had a great conversation with one of the most polarizing figures in sports, Coach Jason Brown from seasons 3 & 4 of Netflix’s Last Chance U. This is a very inside look into who Jason Brown is as a person and what drives him as a man and a football coach. We hope you enjoy it as much as we did. Also, the boys close out with Friday Bangerz to send you into the weekend the right way.
dc:creator: The Pod
